home.subtitle: Analyze prompts, review code, calculate costs, and manage context. Everything you need to build AI applications faster.
home.powerfulToolsDesc: Free & open source. Everything you need in one place.
home.securityDesc: Detect prompt injection, jailbreak attempts and data exfiltration before they reach your API.
home.costDesc: Find the cheapest model for your use case. Save up to 60% on AI API costs.
home.dxDesc: Clean UI, fast feedback, no unnecessary complexity. Ship faster.
home.ctaSubtitle: No signup required. No API keys needed. Just open and use. Contribute on GitHub.
home.footer: © 2026 DevFlow AI · Free & Open Source · Built with Next.js 16 ·

tokenViz.wasteDesc: Highlighting redundant spaces or characters that inflate the count.
tokenViz.legend: Tokens are approximate. Real tokenization varies by model (BPE algorithm). Common words = 1 token. Rare/long words may split into multiple tokens.

dtoMatic.cleanArchDescLong: Generates Entity + Mapper + DTO — 3-layer Clean Architecture pattern
dtoMatic.zodDescLong: Generates TypeScript interfaces + Zod schemas for runtime validation
dtoMatic.quickDescLong: Quick DTO class only — fastest output, no mappers or extra layers
dtoMatic.architecturalEngineDesc: Transform raw JSON into production-ready Clean Architecture layers. Supports TS, Java, Python, Go & C#.
uuid.collisionNote: At a rate of 1 billion UUIDs per second, it would take 100 years to have a 50% chance of a collision.
uuid.controlCenterDesc: Generate secure unique identifiers or perform bit-level analysis on existing ones to detect privacy leaks and version data.
